question: I just had a physical with my doctor and my blood looked okay, but I feel tired and weak during the day. When sitting up in a chair I feel stiff and when laying on my stomach I feel tired and will probably fall asleep. I exercise about 1-3 times a week (karate) for about 1-1.5 hours every time. sometimes I feel weak and run out of breath fast. I also get sweaty fast. Also my stamina is also low.Also I am having a hard time focusing on things, especially in class. Sometimes I also get headaches.also I find it hard to wake up in the morning.Also I am a 21 year old male.
title: What could be wrong with me?
